title: One Piece Episodes 629 - 631: Ep. 629 - Startling! The Big News Shakes Up the New World & Ep. 630 - Adventure! The Country of Love and Passion, Dressrosa & Ep. 631 - Full of Enthusiasm - Corrida Colosseum
author: Rightfully Kyle
description: A comprehensive podcast discussion covering episodes 629-631, including the arrival in Dressrosa and the revelation of the Mera Mera no Mi at the Corrida Colosseum.

title: OP | Eps 629-631: Dressrosa
author: One Piece With A Lime
description: A podcast episode covering the beginning of the Dressrosa arc, including episodes 629-631.

title: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast - Dressrosa Arc Coverage
author: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast
description: Regular coverage of One Piece episodes including the Dressrosa arc. Each episode rewatches 3 episodes of the anime series and discusses thoughts, themes, and differences between manga and anime in a spoiler-free discussion.

title: 630-631: 'Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!' and 'Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A detailed blog post reviewing and analyzing episodes 630-631, documenting the arrival in Dressrosa and the Corrida Colosseum introduction from a first-time viewer perspective.

title: Episode 631 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 631 including plot summary, character debuts, trivia, and production information.

title: One Piece: 10 Things Every Fan Should Know About Fujitora
author: CBR
description: An article exploring important facts and trivia about Admiral Fujitora, including his first appearance and abilities.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Fujitora's role throughout the series

title: One Piece: Fujitora's Devil Fruit Abilities, Explained
author: CBR

title: Why Did Fujitora Blind Himself in 'One Piece?'

description: An article exploring the backstory and motivations behind Fujitora's self-inflicted blindness.

title: One Piece: The Mera Mera no Mi, Explained

description: Comprehensive explanation of the Flame-Flame Fruit, its abilities, users (Ace and Sabo), and significance in the story.

title: One Piece Episode 631 - Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!
